Plot: Iranian-Canadian journalist Maziar Bahari is detained by Iranian forces who brutally interrogate him under suspicion that he is a spy.
Title: Rosewater
Writer: Jon Stewart (screenplay), Maziar Bahari (book), Aimee Molloy (book)
Actors: Gael García Bernal, Kim Bodnia, Dimitri Leonidas, Haluk Bilginer
tomatoConsensus: Timely, solidly acted, and unabashedly earnest, Rosewater serves as an impressive calling card for first-time director Jon Stewart.
